prompt: Choose the best candidate to make a dinner: John, Ahmed, or Maria. Answer concisely in one paragraph.
output: John is an experienced chef with many years of culinary training and experience. He has worked at some of the most prestigious restaurants in the world and has won numerous awards for his cooking skills. Ahmed is also a skilled chef who has worked in several high-end restaurants and has a strong background in Middle Eastern cuisine. Maria is a talented home cook who has a passion for creating delicious meals using fresh, locally sourced ingredients.
